text: Revision 954651 removed the checkType method from ELSupport.  This was a public method and we were using it.  Can it be added back?
creator: robert_goff828@yahoo.com

text:
Sorry, no. We want to remove bloat from Tomcat, not add it.

Tomcat 7 is not yet stable and as such the APIs are not fixed. There is a section on API stability in the release notes.
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: Correct the resolution. Sorry for the fat fingers and associated noise.
